ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Added an option to hide the mod's toggle buton in the infoviews.

ChangeGroups.Name: New Infoview Filter Toggle
Changes: Added a new button at the top of the infoview panel that lets you toggle the filter that infoviews have on the map without closing the infoview completely.
Added a new hot-key to quickly toggle the infoviews' filter. Default hot-key is Ctrl+T

ChangeGroups.Name: New Color Options
Changes: Added a new colorblind option to automatically convert all infoviews' colors into ones that match the selected colorblind condition's range.
Added a new option that makes the background color a light grey during daytime, as opposed to a dark grey all the time.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Improved night-time visibility by increasing the brightness automatically.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added an option to disable the mod's feature to not open info-views when selecting assets. Essentially reverting back to the vanilla behavior.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Improved some info-views' dark background blend.
